ActJudges Act
SubjectElizabeth Reid ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Robert F. Reid
PrecisGranting of an annuity to ELIZABETH REID, widow of the Honourable Robert F. Reid, a Judge of the Ontario Court of Justice (General Division), effective October 27, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
